title: Maximum Tape Measure, 25-Ft -
description: MAXIMUM Tape Measure features a high impact resistant case with rubberized grip. Oversized dual grapple end hook allows users to grip an object from all sides. Abrasion resistant extruded nylon blade coating for maximum life. Large bold printing on both sides of the blade. Length: 25'.

title: Bosch 50' Compact Laser Measure -
description: The Bosch GLM 15 laser measure is the smallest, simplest way of measuring. Thanks to its laser precision technology and continuous measurement mode, it takes instant and reliable measurements up to 50 ft so you can size up your job in seconds. Square and compact by design, the GLM 15 laser measure is ready for anywhere portability. It fits comfortably in your hand and easily into your pocket. With just one button and a shape that lets you measure in any position, the GLM 15 laser measure makes measuring easier and faster than a tape measure.

title: Cabbage Patch Kids - 12" Bike -
description: Size 10 - 12" bikes are suitable for riders with an inseam of 16" - 18" To measure your inseam stand straight and flat footed on the floor. Use a measuring tape to get the length of your inside leg measurement, or inseam.

title: Dinotrux Reptool Revvit -
description: Work and play like a favorite Dinotrux character! Reptool Revvit from the Mechazoic Era is ready to roll into fun on wheels that mimic his movement on the animated show. Complete with unique Reptool sounds and phrases, he features a tail-activated spinning drill head with interchangeable bits and a real measuring tape tongue.

title: Deluxe Travel Emergency Kit -
description: 1 Year, 24 Hour Roadside Assistance Service, 6 Gauge 8 ft Booster Cables, 10 LED Headlamp, 3x AAA Batteries, 19 pc First Aid Kit, Utility Knife, Whistle with Lanyard, Siphon Pump, Safety Vest, Pair of Knit Work Gloves, Elastic Tie-Down Cord, Hose Tape, Help Flag, All packed in a Zippered Carry Bag with Reflective Triangle.

title: Large First Aid Kit -
description: Record book, 36 bandages, 8 knuckle bandages, 6 fingertip bandages, 1 triangular bandage, 1 gauze bandage roll, 4 gauze pads, 1 adhesive tape, 12 alcohol prep pads, 12 safety pins, 6 antiseptic hand towelettes, 9 anti-mosquito towelettes, 16 cotton balls, tweezers, and scissors
